str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

word: I am being poured out like a drink offering
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To pour out as a libation. Apparently a primary verb; to pour out as a libation, i.e. to devote.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: A primary verb; to be 'cheer'ful, i.e. Calmly happy or well-off; impersonally, especially as salutation, be well.

str2: To rejoice with, congratulate. From sun and chairo; to sympathize in gladness, congratulate.
